FuncDef: The display mpls rsvp-te reservation command displays RSVP-TE resource reservation information for an RSVP-TE-enabled interface.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays RSVP-TE reservation information of an interface that is not in the stale state.
-

Specifies the type and number of an interface.
-

Displays information about RSVP-TE neighbor nodes on a specified interface.
-

Peer IP address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Examples: Local LSP ID: 0                   Session Tunnel ID: 200
Token bucket rate: 0.00           Token bucket size: 1000.00
Local LSP ID: 1                   Session Tunnel ID: 300
Token bucket rate: 0.00           Token bucket size: 1000.00
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display mpls rsvp-te reservation command displays RSVP-TE resource reservation information for an RSVP-TE-enabled interface.
